column5: a foreigner was arrested on charges of not paying for his stay at Arun Guest House: Romman
column10: holds a Russian Federation passport.------Immigration Police went to question him on October 17
column15: he became ill and was admitted to Calmette Hospital. After treatment the hospital kept his passport there and his visa later expired.------The foreign national entered Cambodia through the Cham Yeam International Checkpoint on November 27
column16: 2018 and extended his visa to 27 March 2019.------The foreigner is currently being sent to the Preah Sihanouk Provincial Evacuation and Immigration Agency for investigation and enforcement. ------POST NEWS
